submodules.title: Introduction to Deep Learning
submodules.description: This lesson covers the basics of deep learning and its applications

submodules.title: Overview of Advanced Machine Learning Techniques
submodules.description: This lesson provides an overview of advanced machine learning techniques, including ensemble methods and transfer learning

activities.title: Build a Simple Neural Network
activities.description: Implement a basic neural network using TensorFlow or PyTorch to classify MNIST digits

activities.title: Ensemble Learning Lab
activities.description: Compare the performance of different ensemble methods on a classification task

submodules.title: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
submodules.description: This lesson covers the basics of CNNs, including convolutional layers, pooling layers, and fully connected layers

submodules.title: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) Networks
submodules.description: This lesson covers the basics of RNNs and LSTMs, including their applications in natural language processing and time series forecasting

activities.title: Image Classification with CNNs
activities.description: Train a CNN model to classify images from the CIFAR-10 dataset

activities.title: Time Series Prediction with LSTMs
activities.description: Implement an LSTM network for predicting stock prices or weather patterns

submodules.title: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and Variational Autoencoders (VAEs)
submodules.description: This lesson covers the basics of GANs and VAEs, including their applications in image and video generation

submodules.title: Attention Mechanisms and Transformers
submodules.description: This lesson covers the basics of attention mechanisms and transformers, including their applications in natural language processing and computer vision

activities.title: Face Generation with GANs
activities.description: Build and train a GAN to generate realistic human faces

activities.title: Text Generation with Transformers
activities.description: Fine-tune a pre-trained transformer model for creative text generation

submodules.title: Explainable AI (XAI) and Model Interpretability
submodules.description: This lesson covers the basics of XAI and model interpretability, including techniques for explaining and interpreting machine learning models

submodules.title: Adversarial Robustness and Security
submodules.description: This lesson covers the basics of adversarial robustness and security, including techniques for defending against adversarial attacks

activities.title: Model Interpretation Workshop
activities.description: Apply LIME and SHAP techniques to interpret the predictions of a black-box model

submodules.title: Machine Learning in Computer Vision
submodules.description: This lesson covers the applications of machine learning in computer vision, including image classification, object detection, and segmentation

submodules.title: Machine Learning in Natural Language Processing
submodules.description: This lesson covers the applications of machine learning in natural language processing, including text classification, sentiment analysis, and language translation

activities.title: Object Detection Project
activities.description: Implement an object detection system using YOLO or Faster R-CNN

activities.title: Sentiment Analysis Application
activities.description: Build a web application that performs real-time sentiment analysis on user input
